values: Lets say you are sleeping with a guy for over a month, and you are clearly going home with him... and one of your supposedly closest friends is flirting with him SO hardcore the guy (and probably everyone else in the bar) thinks sh has a crush on him.  Not fucking cool. Yes.  She knew.

PS.  1.  I would like to get an Oragami frog!
2.  You never told me the dead frog story.  It was funny.   I demand stories and I get things like "Once I wore shoes" when you are keeping all tehe good dead animal ones to yourself!
3.  We were a bit rowdy this evening, no?

haiku
A fellow in leeds
White sheets and a bright blue wall
oft seen never smelled

Just thought you should know.
   Caspartame is the ghost of a kitten.  I do not remember exactly how he came about, but it was in a conversation with Pixelmatt...  he was talking about ghosts and their being cute.. then it moved into ghosts of kittens being cuter..  then I drew a picture of a ghost kitten.  I named it Caspartame because Casper is a ghost and Aspartame is sweet and artificial.. like a ghost..  and a kitten?  Kittens are not fake, but they are sweet.  
    cannot master the purl.
